title: Formulario mathematico
summary: Formulario Mathematico (Latino sine flexione:[1] Formulary for Mathematics) is a book[2] by Giuseppe Peano which expresses fundamental theorems of mathematics in a symbolic language developed by Peano. The author was assisted by Giovanni Vailati, Mario Pieri, Alessandro Padoa, Giovanni Vacca, Vincenzo Vivanti, Gino Fano and Cesare Burali-Forti.
